case.title: Lovely Relationship - 31 (Westchester County ,NY)
case.text: I'm looking for a woman who's down to earth, educated, single with no kids, who's drug and disease free. A woman who likes being outdoors and indoors as well and who enjoys life. Myself , I'm 31 , black , 5'11, educated, single with no kids , drug free, disease free and just looking for someone who's looking for a relationship. If you like my ad and if this sounds like you . Feel free to send me a message Bye
